column1: Little Goat Diner////We know we succeeded when you say you can't wait to come back to Little Goat! We're so happy that your search for an excellent meal led you to us and that we were able to accommodate you. It's outstanding to hear that your service was up to par and that we took care to cater to your food allergies. We're glad that each item you ordered improved your meal overall and hope you'll return to enjoy more perfectly cooked fries in the near future
